markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Dragon Breath](/Spells.aspx?ID=2103)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 263 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=23)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. The damage type depends on the magical tradition related to the dragon that influenced your bloodline: **arcane** force, **divine** spirit, **occult** mental, or **primal** fire.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Dragon Breath

text: Dragon Breath Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 263 1.1 Bloodline Draconic Area 30-foot cone Defense basic Reflex --- You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 damage with a basic Reflex save. The damage type depends on the magical tradition related to the dragon that influenced your bloodline: arcane force, divine spirit, occult mental, or primal fire. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
